languages.text: Deals <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to Marazhai, and he starts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. While Marazhai is bleeding, he gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
languages.original_text: Наносит Маражаю <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего урона{/g}, вызывая {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}. Пока на Маражая действует этот эффект, он получает +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Deals <u>STR bonus</u> rending damage to Marazhai, and he starts bleeding. While Marazhai is bleeding, he gains +3 resolve.

languages.text: Inflige <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} a Marazhai, que además sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. Mientras Marazhai sufra hemorragia, gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.

While Marazhai is bleeding, he gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inflige <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} a Marazhai, que además sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. Mientras Marazhai sufra hemorragia, gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.

languages.text: 对玛拉斋造成{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，并陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态。当玛拉斋处于流血状态下时，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}会提高3点。
languages.original_text: Deals <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to Marazhai, and he starts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. While Marazhai is bleeding, he gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对玛拉斋造成{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，并陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态。当玛拉斋处于流血状态下时，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}会提高3点。

languages.text: Inflige <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g}</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g} à Marazhai, qui commence à subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Tant qu'il est sous cet effet, Marazhai bénéficie de +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.

While Marazhai is bleeding, he gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inflige <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g}</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g} à Marazhai, qui commence à subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Tant qu'il est sous cet effet, Marazhai bénéficie de +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.

languages.text: Fügt Marazhai <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>-{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} zu, woraufhin er zu {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bluten{/g} beginnt. Solange Marazhai blutet, erhält er +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

While Marazhai is bleeding, he gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Fügt Marazhai <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>-{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Durchdringungsschaden{/g} zu, worauf er zu {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bluten{/g} beginnt.
